title: DOJ charges 'Arrested Development' actor Jay Johnston for involvement in Jan. 6 riot
description: Jay Johnston was arrested in California Wednesday for his alleged involvement in the deadly Capitol insurrection.

title: A wolverine was spotted in California. Here's what happens next
description: Though unconfirmed, he's thought to be a young creature roaming in search of a partner. Relatable!

title: Puerto Rico lost its only elephant — and cracked open a well of emotions
description: Mundi the African elephant was the pride of Puerto Rico's only zoo. But her fate became entangled in the island's recent struggles with natural disasters and a debilitating debt crisis.

title: 6 months in, Hakeem Jeffries reflects on the debt ceiling drama and replacing Pelosi
description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries sat down with All Things Considered's Juana Summers to talk about the recent debt ceiling negotiations and what this says about the direction Congress is headed.

title: 'Los Angeles Times' to lay off 13% of newsroom
description: The L.A. Times is the latest in a string of media outlets to cut staff, citing economic headwinds. Leaders say 74 journalists will lose their jobs.

title: Soccer shocker: Lionel Messi says he will join Miami's MLS team
description: After months of speculation, Messi announced his decision Wednesday to join Inter Miami, a franchise that has been led by another global soccer icon in David Beckham since its inception.

title: 'What the duck' no more: Apple will stop autocorrecting your favorite swear word
description: Apple says its new autocorrect will use machine learning to understand users' habits and preferences, including when to leave words alone. The update is expected this fall, so get your ducks in a row.

title: Moms for Liberty among conservative groups named 'extremist' by civil rights watchdog
description: As the influence of Moms for Liberty grows in some school districts and conservative political circles, the SPLC compares the group's agenda to segregationist efforts of an earlier era.

title: A haze is blanketing major swaths of the East Coast because of the Canadian wildfires
description: Some of the worst air quality was recorded in the Great Lakes region and in Pennsylvania, New York, New Jersey and the Washington, D.C., metro area.

title: Former aide to President Trump testifies before a grand jury in Florida
description: Taylor Budowich's testimony is part of a parade of witnesses in the special counsel's classified documents probe.

title: Trump's former White House chief of staff testifies before a grand jury
description: Mark Meadows' testimony is part of a parade of witnesses in the special counsel's classified documents probe.

title: Pope Francis is getting a hernia-related surgery in Rome
description: The pope will undergo "a laparotomy and abdominal wall surgery under general anesthesia" on Wednesday, the Holy See's official news portal says. The pope had complained of abdominal pain on Tuesday.

title: The far right's growing influence and 4 other takeaways from NPR's ERIC investigation
description: Why are Republicans abandoning one of the best tools the government has to catch voter fraud? That question is the focus of a new NPR investigation. Here are five takeaways from the report.

title: To keep immigrants from fleeing, Florida GOP focus on immigration law loopholes
description: Republican lawmakers in Florida are scrambling to convince established immigrant workers who already have jobs to stay, while making it inhospitable for newly arrived migrants.

title: Why you might notice more religious groups at Pride celebrations this year
description: Some people of faith are organizing a pushback against the wave of anti-LGBTQ rights legislation making its way through state houses this year. They're calling it Faith for Pride.

title: Prison sexual assault victims can now petition for compassionate release
description: Advocates are hoping more survivors of sexual assaults in federal prison can use a new method to win early release.

title: Kids can't all be star athletes. Here's how schools can welcome more students to play
description: Most American kids quit playing sports by age 11. That means a lot of kids are missing out on some of the huge benefits of sports, including spacial awareness, physical activity and team skills.

title: Françoise Gilot, the famed artist who loved and then left Picasso, is dead at 101
description: The French-born Françoise Gilot had long made her frustration clear that despite acclaim for her art she would still be best known for her relationship with the older Picasso.
